text: This is a list of prime ministers of Mali since the country gained independence from France in 1960 to the present day. ==List of officeholders== Portrait Name Term of office Political party Head(s) of state Took office Left office Time in office 1 Modibo Keïta 1960 1965 5 years US–RDA Himself Post abolished (1965 – 19 November 1968) 2 Yoro Diakité 1968 1969 Military M. Traoré Post abolished (18 September 1969 – 6 June 1986) 3 Mamadou Dembelé 1986 1988 years UDPM M. Traoré Post abolished (6 June 1988 – 2 April 1991) – Soumana Sacko 1991 1992 Independent Touré 4 Younoussi Touré 1992 1993 Independent Konaré 5 Abdoulaye Sékou Sow 1993 1994 Independent Konaré 6 Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta 1994 2000 ADEMA–PASJ Konaré 7 Mandé Sidibé 2000 2002 ADEMA–PASJ Konaré 8 Modibo Keita 2002 2002 Independent Konaré 9 Ahmed Mohamed ag Hamani 2002 2004 Independent Touré 10 Ousmane Issoufi Maïga 2004 2007 Independent Touré 11 Modibo Sidibé 2007 2011 Independent Touré 12 Cissé Mariam Kaïdama Sidibé 2011 2012 Independent Touré Vacant (22 March – 17 April 2012) – Cheick Modibo Diarra 2012 2012 Independent D. Traoré – Django Sissoko 2012 2013 Independent D. Traoré 13 Oumar Tatam Ly 2013 2014 Independent I. B. Keïta 14 Moussa Mara 2014 2015 Independent I. B. Keïta Modibo Keita 2015 2017 Independent I. B. Keïta 15 Abdoulaye Idrissa Maïga 2017 2017 RPM I. B. Keïta 16 Soumeylou Boubèye Maïga 2017 2019 ASMA-CFP I. B. Keïta Vacant (18 April – 23 April 2019) 17 Boubou Cissé 2019 2020 Independent I. B. Keïta Vacant (18 August – 27 September 2020) – Moctar Ouane 2020 2021 Independent B. Ndaw Vacant (24 May – 6 June 2021) – Choguel Kokalla Maïga 2021 2022 Independent A. Goïta – Abdoulaye Maïga 2022 2022 Independent A. Goïta – Choguel Kokalla Maïga 2022 2024 Independent A. Goïta – Abdoulaye Maïga 2024 Incumbent Independent A. title: List of prime ministers of Mali
